\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\&\&\& {(-, ?)_{\mathcal T}} \&\& 0 \\
	0 \& {\ker [(\pi _i)_S]} \&\& {(-, X_i)_{\mathcal T}} \&\& {F(-)} \& 0 \\
	0 \& {\ker [(\pi _{i+1})_S]} \&\& {(-, X_{i+1})_{\mathcal T}} \&\& {F(-)} \& 0
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=1-6]
	\arrow["{(\kappa _i)_\ast}", from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{(\pi _i)_S}", from=2-4, to=2-6]
	\arrow["{(\phi _i)_\ast}", from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=2-6, to=2-7]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-6, to=3-6]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{(\pi _{i+1})_S}", from=3-4, to=3-6]
	\arrow[from=3-6, to=3-7]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
